abstract: Coalition of Australian senators from Greens, Labor Party and smaller political parties blocks proposition to hold national plebiscite on legalizing gay marriage; parties support legalization but fear plebiscite could become platform for hate speech.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Many of those who opposed the nonbinding plebiscite said it would be a platform for hate speech. Instead, they want lawmakers to decide the issue directly.
snippet: Many of those who opposed the nonbinding plebiscite said it would be a platform for hate speech. Instead, they want lawmakers to decide the issue directly....

headline.main: Australia’s Parliament Rejects Public Vote on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Australian Senate Rejects Public Vote on Gay Marriage
